transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir good morning se baat kar rahi ho ha ji se baat kar rahi ho India se ji
Customer: ha ji bol sir actually aapki service ke regards me aapne bataya tha na mere ko loan wala issue jo bata rahe the aap
Executive: ha ji ha ji usme main aapko information de deti hu ki kaise scene rehta hai hamara scenario kya rehta hai isme na sir hamare sath kafi sari banks hoti hai theek hai different different jo ki hamare sath tie up na hoti hai aur wo jaise ki aap agar apne through theek hai directly kisi bank me apply karoge to thoda slow process chalta hai but hamare sath mujhe to mere ko aap se hi karwana hai mere ko aap se hi karwana hai kyuki kya hai aapke sath kam karna chahta hu iske hisab se aap se hi kam karwana hai
Executive: ha bilkul wahi main bata rahi hu sir to hamare sath jo alag alag banks ka tie up hai na wo jo tie up wali banks hai wo direct aapko contact karegi sir India mart directly nahi deta loan India mart apne tie up wali jo banks hoti hai na wo log provide karate hai
Customer: okay aur kitne din ka process hai
Executive: sir dekho hamare sath tie up hai to aapke pass agar ek bar connect ho jata hai theek hai to uske baad to process aapka jaldi jaldi chali jayega but ye hai ki ek bar aapka jaise proceed hoga theek hai to khud hi call aate hai ab ye scenario hai ki sir main agar directly contact kar lu theek hai main kar nahi sakti sir kyuki ye third party hai third party matlab hamara tie up hai bank se theek hai to ultimately sir karne to proceed bank hi wali hai
Customer: okay theek hai ha ji to thoda sa aapko wait karna rahega jaise ki banks ka aapke pass khud hi call aaye theek hai aapke records wagera sara kuch verify hota hai uske baad me aapke pass call aata hai to uske liye thoda sa time lagta hai but ha aapke pass aa jayega sir
Executive: theek hai lekin approx kitne din ka time hai sir
Executive: sir aise ek tentative ya approx mere pass aisa kuch idea hai nahi theek hai jaise ki maine discuss kiya kyuki depend karta hai aapke sare specification pe aapke bank records pe credit report pe to is vajah se sir thoda sa time bhi lag jata hai but ye hai ki wait hi karna padega sir iske liye main aapko ek fix time duration nahi de sakti hu
Customer: theek hai process kar dijiye koi parwah nahi kar dijiye agar maine bhi dala hai kon sa pehla process karte hai usme dekhte hai process kar dijiye aap
Executive: ha to ek kam karte hai dekho waise to hamare pass information nahi aata par fir bhi agar koi bhi information aayega na to main turant aapko on the spot whatsapp pe text kar dungi theek hai ki ye mere pass update aaya hai directly theek hai to aap check kar lijiyega uske through aur baki directly sir mails pe aur calls pe thoda sa active rahiye jaise ki aapke pass koi bhi mail ya call aata hai to aap lose na kar de kyuki dekho aapne loan ke liye apply kiya hai to mail ya call to aa sakta hai sir aapko iske liye
Customer: hmm theek hai ek ticket ticket generate hua tha ticket generate hua tha 1847 wo kis regarding hua tha bata sakte ho
Executive: acha 1847 sir ye isliye hua tha kyuki mera jo call hai na wo miss ho gaya tha maine pehla call uthaya nahi tha sir receive nahi kar pai thi main phone off tha ya network issue tha mera isse
Customer: no problem theek hai
Executive: to sir main agar aap allow kare to main use close kar du kyuki ab to meri baat ho gayi hai
Customer: already close kiya hai aapne already close kiya hai na
Executive: nahi close nahi hua sir abhi on hai 1847 abhi bhi on hai ye ticket id kyuki mere pass aaya tha ye theek hai main close kar deti hu aapke pass fir ek mera mere liye na aapke pass ek mail aayega to please satisfied mark kar dijiyega
Customer: ji ji ha ji ha mera ye process karwa dijiye urgently
Executive: bilkul bilkul main forward kar deti hu baki jo bhi update aata hai main aapko fir batati hu theek hai waise to directly rahega par agar mere pass bhi aata hai to main aapko update kar dungi sir
Customer: theek hai
Executive: ha okay sir thank you so much sir please mail pe satisfied de dijiyega wo mere liye hoga theek hai
Customer: okay thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants loan process to be expedited.

- Customer asks about ticket 1847.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the loan process.

- Executive informed the customer about tie-up banks.

- Executive offered to close ticket 1847.

- Executive assured to forward the loan process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will text customer on WhatsApp for updates.

- Customer to mark satisfied on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- loan, process, ticket, banks, update
